title: Recaptured by the Crime Lord
description: “If I had an ounce of mercy in me, I’d let you live a normal life, but I can’t leave you alone.”Lyla Dalton is a shell of her former self. She and her cousin have been traveling cross country in an RV, trying to outrun their pasts, but that’s about to come to an end.Gavin Pyre is out of jail and he’s coming for her. This time, when he catches her, there will be no escape.Author's This is a dark romance novel with triggers, violence, and mature themes that may make some readers uncomfortable.
author: Mia  Knight
